title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.8 - Private trade schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.8 - Private trade schools

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner shall make regulations and establish standards for the licensing
and conduct of private trade schools. (b) It shall be the duty of the commissioner
and he is hereby authorized to determine the adequacy of resources and
equipment, the standards of instruction, the educational efficiency and the
eligibility for license of such schools. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
13.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
